comment:
*  Encapsulates the telecom audio state, including the current audio routing, supported audio
 *  routing and mute.
 *  @deprecated - use {@link CallAudioState} instead.
 *  @hide

variables.name: ROUTE_EARPIECE
variables.comment: Direct the audio stream through the device's earpiece.

variables.name: ROUTE_BLUETOOTH
variables.comment: Direct the audio stream through Bluetooth.

variables.name: ROUTE_WIRED_HEADSET
variables.comment: Direct the audio stream through a wired headset.

variables.name: ROUTE_SPEAKER
variables.comment: Direct the audio stream through the device's speakerphone.

variables.name: ROUTE_WIRED_OR_EARPIECE
variables.comment:
* Direct the audio stream through the device's earpiece or wired headset if one is
     * connected.

variables.name: ROUTE_ALL
variables.comment: Bit mask of all possible audio routes.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Responsible for creating AudioState objects for deserialized Parcels.

methods.name: private static void listAppend(StringBuffer buffer, String str)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel destination, int flags)
methods.comment: * Writes AudioState object into a serializeable Parcel.

methods.name: public boolean isMuted()
methods.comment: * @return {@code true} if the call is muted, false otherwise.

methods.name: public int getRoute()
methods.comment: * @return The current audio route being used.

methods.name: public int getSupportedRouteMask()
methods.comment: * @return Bit mask of all routes supported by this call.

methodNames: private static void listAppend(StringBuffer buffer, String str)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel destination, int flags)
